AT.name: Defenders of Oasis™
AT.description: Einst von Helden vergangener Zeiten gefangen genommen, wurde der niederträchtige Magier Ahriman von bösen Mächten beschworen. Nun drohen seine Armeen, das friedliche Land von Shanadar heimzusuchen. Als Prinz des Königreichs liegt es in diesem klassischen japanischen Rollenspielabenteuer an dir, mächtige Verbündete um dich zu scharen und sie anzuführen, um Ahrimans Soldaten aus dem Königreich zu vertreiben! Rekrutiere einzigartige Verbündete wie eine Prinzessin, einen Dschinn und einen Dieb! Bekämpfe Gegner, um Stärke zu erlangen, und verbessere die Waffen und Rüstungen deiner Helden, um gegen Ahriman ins Feld zu ziehen.

BG.name: Defenders of Oasis™
BG.description: Once captured by heroes of a bygone era, the foul wizard Ahriman has been summoned by dark forces and his armies now threaten to ravage the peaceful land of Shanadar. As the prince of the kingdom, rally powerful allies to your side and lead them onward to repel Ahriman’s forces throughout the kingdom in this classic Japanese role playing adventure. Recruit unique allies such as a princess, genie and thief! Fight enemies to gain strength and upgrade your heroes’ weapons and armour in order to fight Ahriman.

AU.name: Defenders of Oasis™
AU.description: Once captured by heroes of a bygone era, the foul wizard Ahriman has been summoned by dark forces and his armies now threaten to ravage the peaceful land of Shanadar. As the prince of the kingdom, rally powerful allies to your side and lead them onward to repel Ahriman’s forces throughout the kingdom in this classic Japanese role playing adventure. Recruit unique allies such as a princess, genie and thief! Fight enemies to gain strength and upgrade your heroes’ weapons and armour in order to fight Ahriman.

ES.name: Defenders of Oasis™
ES.description: Una vez capturado por los héroes de la antigüedad, el repugnante brujo Ahriman ha sido invocado por las fuerzas oscuras y ahora sus ejércitos amenazan con arrasar las pacíficas tierras de Shanadar. Como príncipe del reino, reúne a poderosos aliados para que te ayuden a repeler a las fuerzas de Ahriman por todo el reino en este clásico juego de rol de aventuras japonés. ¡Recluta a exclusivos aliados tales como una princesa, un genio y un ladrón! Lucha con enemigos para ganar fuerza y mejorar las armas de tus héroes para enfrentarte a Ahriman.

FI.name: Defenders of Oasis™
FI.description: Once captured by heroes of a bygone era, the foul wizard Ahriman has been summoned by dark forces and his armies now threaten to ravage the peaceful land of Shanadar. As the prince of the kingdom, rally powerful allies to your side and lead them onward to repel Ahriman’s forces throughout the kingdom in this classic Japanese role playing adventure. Recruit unique allies such as a princess, genie and thief! Fight enemies to gain strength and upgrade your heroes’ weapons and armour in order to fight Ahriman.

BE.name: Defenders of Oasis™
BE.description: Ahriman, le sorcier corrompu, fut autrefois capturé par des héros d'une ère révolue. Des forces obscures viennent de l'invoquer et des armées menacent de détruire le royaume paisible de Shanadar. En tant que prince, vous devrez réunir de puissants alliés pour repousser les forces d'Ahriman en dehors du royaume de cette aventure japonaise classique. Recrutez des alliés uniques, tels qu'une princesse, un génie et un voleur ! Combattez les ennemis pour gagner en force et améliorer les armes et armures de vos héros en vue de vaincre Ahriman.

CH.name: Defenders of Oasis™
CH.description: Einst von Helden vergangener Zeiten gefangen genommen, wurde der niederträchtige Magier Ahriman von bösen Mächten beschworen. EE.name: Defenders of Oasis™
EE.description: Once captured by heroes of a bygone era, the foul wizard Ahriman has been summoned by dark forces and his armies now threaten to ravage the peaceful land of Shanadar. As the prince of the kingdom, rally powerful allies to your side and lead them onward to repel Ahriman’s forces throughout the kingdom in this classic Japanese role playing adventure. Recruit unique allies such as a princess, genie and thief! Fight enemies to gain strength and upgrade your heroes’ weapons and armour in order to fight Ahriman.

NL.name: Defenders of Oasis™
NL.description: De kwaadaardige tovenaar Ahriman werd ooit gevangengenomen door de helden van een vorig tijdperk, en hij wordt nu opgeroepen door duistere krachten. Zijn legers dreigen het vredige land van Shanadar met de grond gelijk te maken. Kruip in de huid van de prins van het koninkrijk, verzamel krachtige bondgenoten en versla samen Ahrimans leger in dit klassieke, Japanse RPG-avontuur. Rekruteer unieke bondgenoten, waaronder een prinses, een geest en een dief! Vecht tegen vijanden voor extra kracht en upgrade de wapens en bepantsering van je helden om Ahriman te kunnen verslaan.

HU.name: Defenders of Oasis™
HU.description: Once captured by heroes of a bygone era, the foul wizard Ahriman has been summoned by dark forces and his armies now threaten to ravage the peaceful land of Shanadar. As the prince of the kingdom, rally powerful allies to your side and lead them onward to repel Ahriman’s forces throughout the kingdom in this classic Japanese role playing adventure. Recruit unique allies such as a princess, genie and thief! Fight enemies to gain strength and upgrade your heroes’ weapons and armour in order to fight Ahriman.

IT.name: Defenders of Oasis™
IT.description: Il malefico mago Ahriman, un tempo imprigionato da antichi eroi, è stato evocato da forze oscure e ora i suoi eserciti minacciano di distruggere la pacifica terra di Shanadar. Vesti i panni del principe del regno e trova potenti alleati per guidarli contro le forze di Ahriman attraverso il regno di questo classico GdR giapponese. Recluta alleati unici, come una principessa, un genio e un ladro! Combatti i nemici per aumentare la tua forza e potenziare armi e armature dei tuoi eroi per affrontare Ahriman.

HR.name: Defenders of Oasis™
HR.description: Once captured by heroes of a bygone era, the foul wizard Ahriman has been summoned by dark forces and his armies now threaten to ravage the peaceful land of Shanadar. LU.description: Ahriman, le sorcier corrompu, fut autrefois capturé par des héros d'une ère révolue. Des forces obscures viennent de l'invoquer et des armées menacent de détruire le royaume paisible de Shanadar. En tant que prince, vous devrez réunir de puissants alliés pour repousser les forces d'Ahriman en dehors du royaume de cette aventure japonaise classique. Recrutez des alliés uniques, tels qu'une princesse, un génie et un voleur ! Combattez les ennemis pour gagner en force et améliorer les armes et armures de vos héros en vue de vaincre Ahriman.

NO.name: Defenders of Oasis™
NO.description: Once captured by heroes of a bygone era, the foul wizard Ahriman has been summoned by dark forces and his armies now threaten to ravage the peaceful land of Shanadar. As the prince of the kingdom, rally powerful allies to your side and lead them onward to repel Ahriman’s forces throughout the kingdom in this classic Japanese role playing adventure. Recruit unique allies such as a princess, genie and thief! Fight enemies to gain strength and upgrade your heroes’ weapons and armour in order to fight Ahriman.

PT.name: Defenders of Oasis™
PT.description: Em tempos capturados por heróis de uma era passada, o malvado feiticeiro Ahriman foi invocado por forças das trevas e os seus exércitos ameaçam agora devastar a tranquila terra de Shanadar. Na pele do príncipe do reino, reúne potentes aliados e guia-os para repelir as forças de Ahriman de todo o reino neste clássico RPG japonês. Recruta aliados únicos, como uma princesa, um génio e um ladrão! Combate contra inimigos para ganhares força e melhorares as armas e as armaduras dos teus heróis para lutares contra Ahriman.

SE.name: Defenders of Oasis™
SE.description: Once captured by heroes of a bygone era, the foul wizard Ahriman has been summoned by dark forces and his armies now threaten to ravage the peaceful land of Shanadar. As the prince of the kingdom, rally powerful allies to your side and lead them onward to repel Ahriman’s forces throughout the kingdom in this classic Japanese role playing adventure. Recruit unique allies such as a princess, genie and thief! Fight enemies to gain strength and upgrade your heroes’ weapons and armour in order to fight Ahriman.

RO.name: Defenders of Oasis™
RO.description: Once captured by heroes of a bygone era, the foul wizard Ahriman has been summoned by dark forces and his armies now threaten to ravage the peaceful land of Shanadar. As the prince of the kingdom, rally powerful allies to your side and lead them onward to repel Ahriman’s forces throughout the kingdom in this classic Japanese role playing adventure. Recruit unique allies such as a princess, genie and thief! Fight enemies to gain strength and upgrade your heroes’ weapons and armour in order to fight Ahriman.

RU.name: Defenders of Oasis™
RU.description: Силы зла призвали к себе на службу подлого волшебника Ahriman, побежденного героями давно минувших эпох. Войска Ahriman вот-вот вторгнутся в мирную страну Shanadar. В этой классической японской ролевой игре вам предстоит играть роль принца Shanadar и, заручившись поддержкой союзников, повести войска в бой против сил Ahriman, чтобы освободить королевство. На своем пути вы встретите уникальных персонажей — принцессу, джинна и вора. Не отказывайтесь от их помощи, ибо и они могут стать вашими союзниками. Сражайтесь с врагами, чтобы набраться сил, усовершенствовать оружие и доспехи своих бойцов. Только так можно одолеть злодея Ahriman.

LT.name: Defenders of Oasis™
LT.description: Once captured by heroes of a bygone era, the foul wizard Ahriman has been summoned by dark forces and his armies now threaten to ravage the peaceful land of Shanadar.
